recipesJson.name: Bright Clementine Crisp
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: A nice Light and Sweet Tangerine Cookie. Combining the Strawberries  really make the Tangerines full flavor pop for a delicious summertime vape . Add in the Vanilla ,Meringue  and Butter cream for the perfect amount of sweetness to this delightful Tangerine Crisp. The biscuit starts to shine in recipe bringing the cookie flavor out after about week of steep. Still great as a Shake n Vape.
